PropertyValue.String: Reads information on the header data of production orders.
Reads information available on the header data of existing production orders. You can use the standard OData system query options to refine your request.
Reads information on the header data of a single production order.
Reads the information for a specific production order that you specify using the production order number.
Reads the operations of production orders.
Reads information available on the operations of existing production orders. You can use the standard OData system query options to refine your request.
Reads information on a single operation.
Reads the information of a single operation that you specify using the internal routing number for operations and the internal ID of an operation.
Reads the data of production order components without follow-up materials.
Reads the data of production order components without follow-up materials. You can use the standard OData system query options to refine your request.
Reads the data of a single component.
Reads the data for a single production order component that you specify using the reservation number and the reservation item number.
Reads the data of all production order components.
Reads the data of all production order components. You can use the standard OData system query options to refine your request.
Reads the data of a single component.
Reads the data for a single production order component that you specify using the reservation number, the reservation item number, and the reservation record type.
Reads the data of all production order components.
Reads the data of all production order components. You can use the standard OData system query options to refine your request.
Reads the data of a single component.
Reads the data for a single production order component that you specify using the reservation number, the reservation item number, and the reservation record type.
Reads the data of production order items.
Reads the data of production order items. You can use the standard OData system query options to refine your request.
Reads the data of a single item.
Reads the data for a single production order item that you specify using the production order number and the production order item number.
Reads the status of production orders.
Reads information available on the status of existing production orders. You can use the standard OData system query options to refine your request.
Reads the status of a single production order.
Reads the status of a single production order that you specify using the production order number and the status code.
Reads the production resources/tools (PRTs) of production orders.
Reads information available on the production resources/tools (PRTs) of existing production orders. You can use the standard OData system query options to refine your request.
Reads the information on a single production resource/tool (PRT) for an operation.
Reads the information of a single production resource/tool (PRT) that you specify using the internal routing number and the item counter for PRTs.
Creates a new production order.
Creates the header data for a new production order using the properties you provide.
Updates header data of a production order.
Updates some of the header data of a production order. You can update the scheduling type, date and time information and information on quantities.
Updates component data of a production order.
Updates some of the component data of a production order. You can update the required quantity, storage location, and batch number.
Updates component data of a production order.
Updates component data of a production order. Using the Production Order business object, you can update central properties.
Deletes component data of a production order.
Deletes component data of a production order. Using the Production Order business object, you can delete a component.
Updates operation data of a production order.
Updates operation data of a production order. Using the Production Order business object, you can update central properties.
Reads the header data of a production order including the operations.
Reads the header data of a single production order that you specify using the production order number. The response includes information on the operations belonging to the order.
Reads the header data of a production order including the components without follow-up materials.

Reads the header data of a single production order that you specify using the production order number. The response includes information on the components without follow-up materials belonging to the order.
Reads the header data of a production order including all components.
Reads the header data of a single production order that you specify using the production order number. The response includes information on all components belonging to the order.
Reads the header data of a production order including all components.
Reads the header data of a single production order that you specify using the production order number. The response includes information on all components belonging to the order.
Reads the header data of a production order including the items.
Reads the header data of a single production order that you specify using the production order number. The response includes information on the items belonging to the order.
Reads the header data of a production order including the status.
Reads the header data of a single production order that you specify using the production order number. The response includes information on the status of the order.
Reads the header data of a production order including the production resources/tools (PRTs).

Reads the header data of a single production order that you specify using the production order number. The response includes information on the production resources/tools (PRTs) assigned to the order.

Annotation.String: Releases a production order.
Releases a production order that you specify using the production order number.
Releases an operation of a production order.
Releases an operation of a production order that you specify using the production order number and the operation number.
Technically completes a production order.
Technically completes a production order that you specify using the production order number.
Closes a production order.
Closes a production order that you specify using the production order number.
Sets the deletion flag for a production order.
Sets the deletion flag for a production order that you specify using the production order number.
Sets the deletion indicator for a production order.
Sets the deletion indicator for a production order that you specify using the production order number.
Discards a production order.
Discards a production order that you specify using the production order number.
Converts a planned order into a production order.

Converts a planned order that you specify using the planned order number into a production order. You can use external numbering for the production order if required. The planned order gets deleted after the conversion.
Schedules order operations.

Schedules production order operations to be dispatched or deallocated using the scheduling mode and scheduling strategy. You can either choose the dates or retain the operation dates to dispatch the orders.
Sets the delivery completed indicator for a production order.
Sets the delivery completed indicator for a production order that you specify using the production order number.
Sets the status ReleasedByMES for a production order.
Sets the status ReleasedByMES for a production order that you specify using the production order number.
